issue.title: [JS][CI][Archery] Move nodejs linting from js_build.sh to archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7126](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7126). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently all the linters are run by archery, except just a couple ones, like the [js linter](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/scripts/js_build.sh#L29). We should add support for it into archery and run in the lint build.
